cab.content: This Document is the Property of 307His Britannic Mjijesty'3 government military Secret.From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India,mh July 1919.(Received 29th.)10170. 28th July. I. Following from Malleson, dated 26th July :-"Herat. Report from Karez, 22nd July, Bolsheviks said to have urged Governor to send message to Kabul pointing out futility of fighting British until properly equipped, especially in matter of aeroplanes and machine guns. Necessary, therefore, to gain time pending arrival oi: munitions from Russia. Bolsheviks have also urged expediency of connecting Kuslik and Herat by rail, and suggest immediate start "2. Malleson. 27th July :-" Bolsheviks also said to be apprehensive of move by British. The Mahomedans in Bolshevik ranks openly saying that they will not fight against British."
